titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to reassess the allocation of Federal and non-Federal costs for construction of the Cerrillos Dam, Puerto Rico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 10/17/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to reassess the allocation of Federal and non-Federal costs for construction of the Cerrillos Dam carried out as part of the Portages and Bucana Rivers, Puerto Rico, flood control project.
